description: A multistep process that includes high-tension yarn-spinning gives this plaid shirt's cotton fabric a dose of stretch for ease of movement.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 33" body length, a 22" shoulder, a 62¼" chest, and a 36½" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Size Tall 2L has a 36" body length, a 22½" shoulder, a 62¼" chest, and a 39" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs.
Split back yoke with a box pleat ensures a comfortable fit and a greater range of motion.
Signature embroidered pony at the left chest.
